        public boolean doesApptOverlap​(java.lang.String startDate,
                               java.lang.String endDate,
                               int cust_id)
        checks to see if a given customer has any overlapping appointments.
        Parameters:
        startDate - the starting date of the appointment.
        endDate - the ending date of teh appointment.
        cust_id - the id of the customer associated with the appointment.
        Returns:
        a boolean stating if an appointment overlaps with existing appointments or not.
